summary: Part of a "Bubblegum Crisis (1987)" universe, follows a special unit of the A.D. Police, tasked to destroy Boomers, androids that malfunction or gain sentience and go on a rampage in the futuristic city of Megatokyo.
cast: Heather Bryson|Toshio Furukawa|Masaru Ikeda|Kikuko Inoue|Mike Kleinhenz|Mike McFarland|Akemi Okamura|Monica Rial|Somei Uchida|Matt Culpepper|Tiffany Grant|Kazuhiko Inoue|Stephanie Nadolny|Mike Vance|Robert Anderson|David Born|Shelley Calene-Black|Victor Carsrud|Kevin Charles|James Faulkner|John Gremillion|Jay Hickman|Jovan Jackson|Mark Laskowski|Mike MacRae|George Manley|Rob Mungle|Nancy Novotny|Sasha Paysinger|John Swasey|Shawn Taylor|Lew Temple|Gene Tognacci

title: Parasaito Dôruzu
